Package de.lases.control.backing

Class ProfileBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.ProfileBacking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ViewScoped @Named public class ProfileBacking extends Object implements Serializable
Backing bean for the profile page.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the dto objects and gets the global list of science fields from the datasource.

    • onLoad

      public void onLoad()
      Get the user id from the view param and load their data from the datasource. This method should be called by a view action.

    • submitChanges

      public void submitChanges()
      Save the changes to the user profile excluding profile picture and science fields. If the user was elevated to admin, a popup menu will ask for confirmation again.

    • uploadAvatar

      public void uploadAvatar()
      Set a new avatar for the user.

    • deleteAvatar

      public void deleteAvatar()
      Delete the current avatar for the user.

    • addScienceField

      public void addScienceField()
      Add selected science field to the user's science fields.

    • deleteScienceField

      public void deleteScienceField​(ScienceField field)
      Remove a science field from the user's science fields.
      Parameters:
      field - The science field to be removed.

    • abortInPopup

      public void abortInPopup()
      Abort the changes made to the user.

    • saveInPopup

      public void saveInPopup()
      Save the changes made to the user.

    • deleteProfile

      public String deleteProfile()
      Delete the of the user.
      Returns:
      Go to the welcome page.

    • getNumberOfSubmissions

      public int getNumberOfSubmissions()
      Get the number of submission of the logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The number of submissions of the logged-in user.

      Is the popup currently displayed on the screen?

    • hasViewerEditRights

      public boolean hasViewerEditRights()
      Only the user belonging to the profile and an administrator have edit rights.
      Returns:
      true if they have edit rights.
